subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|musical instrument}} [[drum]]
# to [[beat]]; to [[strike]]; to [[play]] (a musical instrument)
# to [[blow]]
# to [[incite]]; to [[encourage]]
# to [[bulge]]

{{attention|zh|also "drum set" (classifier 套?)}}
